abstract: G.M. has set a Jan. 7 deadline for bidders, including Spyker Cars, which has been in talks to buy Saab for the last month.
snippet: G.M. has set a Jan. 7 deadline for bidders, including Spyker Cars, which has been in talks to buy Saab for the last month.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT  General Motors is allowing more time to find a buyer for Saab, a 62-year-old Swedish carmaker, but is proceeding with plans to start shutting it.

headline.main: G.M. Extends Deadline for Saab Bids
headline.print_headline: G.M. Extends Deadline for Bids on Saab, but Proceeds With Plan to Shut It
